title: Are They Spying On You? (Ep 1774)
description:
Are you being spied on? And by who? In this episode, I address the growing surveillance problem, and the invasive technology that could be used to spy on you. 

News Picks:


US military will defend Taiwan 'if it comes to that,' Biden says.

Dan Bongino calls Clinton's Russia collusion hoax the 'biggest political scandal in modern history.’ 


YouTube CEO promises to tackle "misinformation" to win over corporate cash.


The Infamous Wuhan Lab Recently Assembled Monkeypox Strains Using Methods Flagged For Creating 'Contagious Pathogens'.


Media Agency Refuses to Accredit University Unless It Teaches Future Journalists More Social Justice.
